context.title: ABAP Object Search
context.description: ABAP Object Search (DevEpos) can be used to run detailed searches in an ABAP system for certain object types.
ABAP Object Search (DevEpos) can be used to run detailed searches in an ABAP system for certain object types.

context.title: CDS Analyzer
context.description: The CDS Analyzer (DevEpos) can be used to analyze CDS views in certain ways

context.title: Where-Used in CDS Analysis
context.description: Shows all CDS Views that are using a given Database Table/View or CDS View, either as part of the SELECT statement or as an Association.

context.title: CDS Used Entities Analysis
context.description: CDS Analysis to show all used entities of a given CDS view

context.title: CDS Field Analysis
context.description: Analysis View to show the origin of a CDS field or the usages of a field of a Database Table/View or CDS View

context.title: CDS Top-Down Analysis
context.description: Analysis for traversing all entitites that are involved in the SELECT part of a CDS View
